name: The GAUNTLET (ChimericalGames)
description:
The GAUNTLET is a fast paced action game where you, a loyal robot, must pass a series of challenges to appease your computer overlord.

Run, Jump and avoid a plethora of deadly traps, including exploding robots, falling platforms, laser emitters and plasma cannons as you die over and over again trying to complete a series of 3 challenges.

Controls:

Move with WSAD or the ARROW keys, and press SPACE to jump.

Press M to toggle mute.

Press ESC to exit the standalone game.

Making the game:

This game was made in just under 72 hours (with very little sleep) for the GameDev Insiders Jam #1. The theme was 'If you stop, you die'.

Made by Michael Walsh & Marcin Piskorz
